dashboard.subtitle: AI-powered talent discovery and resume matching system

actions.matchDescription: Find the best candidates for your job vacancy using AI-powered semantic search
actions.importDescription: Upload resumes from PDF, DOCX, or images. AI extracts and indexes everything.

import.title: Import Resumes
import.description: Upload PDF, DOCX, or images. AI parses and extracts structured data.

vacancy.title: Enter Vacancy
vacancy.description: Paste your job description. The system analyzes requirements.

matches.title: Get Matches
matches.description: AI ranks candidates by fit. Use LLM mode for detailed analysis.

error.backendHint: Make sure the backend is running:

match.title: Match Candidates
match.subtitle: Find the best candidates for your job vacancy using AI-powered matching
match.placeholder:
Paste the job description here...

Example:
We are looking for a Senior Python Developer with 5+ years of experience.

Required skills:
- Python, FastAPI, PostgreSQL
- Docker, Kubernetes
- Machine Learning basics

Nice to have:
- AWS/GCP experience
- Team lead experience
match.fastModeDescription: Fast Mode: Uses embedding-based semantic search. Quick results based on text similarity. Great for initial screening.
match.aiModeDescription: AI Mode: Uses LLM to analyze each candidate in depth. Provides skill matching, strengths, concerns, and explanations. Slower but more accurate for final selection.
match.errorEmpty: Please enter a vacancy description or upload a file

results.noMatchesHint: Try lowering the minimum score or adjusting your vacancy description

resumes.title: Resume Database
resumes.noResumesHint: Try adjusting your search or import some resumes

import.title: Import Resumes
import.subtitle: Upload individual files or import from a directory
import.dropzone: Drop files here or click to browse
import.dropzoneHint: Supports PDF, DOCX, and images (PNG, JPG)
import.directoryHint: Path relative to the project root. The system will scan all PDF, DOCX, and image files.

tips.title: Tips for best results
tips.pdf: PDF files with selectable text work best
tips.ocr: Images will be processed with OCR (requires Tesseract)
tips.ai: AI extracts contact info, skills, experience, and education
tips.duplicates: Duplicate files (same name) are skipped unless forced
